name: Where is the Moon
description:
I walked around and took photos of a mountain. With your mouse- you can click and explore the mountain. 

Guide:

  1. After loading, open the menu (spacebar).
  2. Click on the book.
  3. Click on "[ ] cold".
  4. Exit menu (spacebar).
  5. Walk around until you hear static, and wait 3 seconds.

After you do this for a bit:

  1. Open the menu.
  2. Click on the "no" tab.
  3. Click on the moon.
  4. Good luck.
